Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Whisperwind Haven
Description: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Whisperwind Haven to her.
QuestDesc: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Whisperwind Haven to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lonely SOL-3... The series is really fun to read, and it features many famous landscapes from Ragunna along with some entertaining stories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It reminds me of a time long ago, before I got sick, when he and I climbed the highest mountain in Huanglong.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At that time, I truly felt like the clouds were within my reach... Sadly, that life is now behind me.

Options.PlotLineKey: You are exploring new places now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fuling
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right. And I'm deeply grateful that you and Changli helped me find the courage to start again.
